caption: We stopped in since it was new in the area and we had an absolutely fantastic experience. The food was hot comfort food and was awesome. The cocktails and mixed drinks were strong and really well made. Atmosphere was super New York tavern …

Got the puzzle box experience “Spirits of Tillinghast” and had an awesome time!!! I can vouch for the chicken Katsu sandwich and my wife loved the burger. The puzzle box was a really cool and unique experience. You get to solve some puzzles …

Excellent pub food and drinks. My girlfriend and I went here for brunch and got the loaded breakfast tots and a sausage biscuit... Amazing!  Normally, when I eat such heavy food I say, "Anything with these ingredients would be this good." …

Really, really love everything that this place is doing.  Delicious, rich, filling food, inventive cocktails,  and cool performances (even in Covid times) - the puzzle box experience that they launched with Immersive company Shine on …
Bison grass vodka with cider, potatoes, and vegan options?!! Yes please and be still my Polish-Irish-Vegan heart! Cannot wait until the pandemic is over to enjoy immersive events here! 💚
